name: Knight
movement: 30 feet speed, capable of mounted combat
description: Knights are heavily armored warriors clad in plate armor, wielding a sword or lance, exemplifying honor and valor on the battlefield.
memorable: Possesses a unique ability to inspire allies and advantage against fear effects.
goals: Serve noble causes, uphold justice, and protect their realm.
relations: Often accompanied by squires and other commoners, and may serve under noble lords.
environment: Typically found in battlefields or noble courts.
strengths: High armor class and hit points, strong melee damage capabilities, and the ability to inspire allies.
weaknesses: Average Dexterity may hinder speed and ranged effectiveness.
attacks: Can make multiple melee attacks with a greatsword or lance, and has a ranged option with a heavy crossbow.
most_powerful_ability: Knightly Inspiration to grant allies enhanced attack rolls and saving throws.
equipment: Plate armor, greatsword, lance, and heavy crossbow.
senses: Keen perception with a passive score of 13.
skills: Good at Athletics, capable of physical challenges and combat maneuvers.
additional_information: Brave ability grants advantage against being frightened.
Chivalrous Presence provides tactical advantages in combat.
Multiattack allows for multiple offensive maneuvers in one turn.
Champion’s Challenge ability allows control over opponents' focus.
Knightly role is often tied to service and loyalty.
